errors.name: UnspecifiedError
errors.msg: Unspecified Error

errors.name: NotPermittedForThisAuthority
errors.msg: The requested action is not permitted for this authority

errors.name: BaseCurrencyFxRateMustBeOneToOne
errors.msg: FX Rate for a base currency must be 1-to-1

errors.name: PlayCurrencyFxRateMustBeZeroToOne
errors.msg: FX Rate for a play currency must be 0-to-1

errors.name: InvalidRevenueShareConfiguration
errors.msg: Invalid or inconsistent revenue share parameters providers

errors.name: MinBetUnitMustBeAMultipleOfIncrementUnit
errors.msg: The minBetUnit for a token must be a multiple of the incrementUnit

errors.name: MinBetUnitAndIncrementUnitMustBeGreaterThanZero
errors.msg: minBetUnit and incrementUnit must be greater than zero

errors.name: TokenAlreadyListed
errors.msg: Token already listed

errors.name: TransferOfZeroTokensAttempted
errors.msg: A transfer of zero tokens was attempted

errors.name: TokenNotFound
errors.msg: Token with this pubkey not found

errors.name: TokenNotSupportedByHouse
errors.msg: The house configuration does not support this token

errors.name: HouseDoesNotAllowOutflows
errors.msg: The house config does not permit outflows currently

errors.name: HouseDoesNotAllowInflows
errors.msg: The house config does not permit inflows currently

errors.name: TokenDoesNotAllowOutflows
errors.msg: The house token config does not permit outflows of this token currently

errors.name: TokenDoesNotAllowInflows
errors.msg: The house token config does not permit inflows of this token currently

errors.name: CallingProgramNotFound
errors.msg: Calling Program with this pubkey not found

errors.name: CallingProgramDoesNotAllowInflows
errors.msg: The Calling Program config does not permit inflows currently

errors.name: CallingProgramDoesNotAllowOutflows
errors.msg: The Calling Program config does not permit outflows currently

errors.name: LiabilityExceedsAvailableTradingBalance
errors.msg: The liability created exceeds the available trading balance

errors.name: BetExceedsKellyCriteriaMaximum
errors.msg: The bet exceeds the Kelly Criteria maximum

errors.name: PlayerMustAcceptLatestHouseTerms
errors.msg: Player must accept the latest house terms

errors.name: PlayerMustAcceptLatestPlatformTerms
errors.msg: Player must accept the latest platform terms

errors.name: PlatformNotAcceptingNewPlayers
errors.msg: The platform status does not allow new player accounts

errors.name: PlatformNotAcceptingNewBets
errors.msg: The platform status does not allow new bets

errors.name: PlatformDoesNotSupportThisToken
errors.msg: The platform does not support this token

errors.name: PlatformDoesNotPermitReferrals
errors.msg: The platform does not permit referral schemes to be created

errors.name: PlatformReferralSchemesMaximumReached
errors.msg: The platform does not permit players to have this many referral schemes

errors.name: HouseStatusDoesNotPermitThisAction
errors.msg: The house status does not permit this action

errors.name: ReferrerAccountIsInvalid
errors.msg: The provided referrer account does not correspond to this platform, house or player or is otherwise invalid

errors.name: ReferralAccountWasNotProvided
errors.msg: The referral account corresponding to this player was not provided

errors.name: DateMustBeInTheFuture
errors.msg: The expiry date must be in the future

errors.name: EnhancedRateMustBeBetterThanDefaultOrExisting
errors.msg: An enhanced benefit must be better than the existing or default rate

errors.name: PlatformDoesNotOfferRakeback
errors.msg: This platform does not offer rakeback

errors.name: RateExceedsMaximumAllowedForPlatform
errors.msg: The rate provided exceeds the maximum allowed for the platform

errors.name: TokenAccountNotOwnedByTokenProgram
errors.msg: The associated token account is not owned by the token program

errors.name: TokenAccountNotOwnedBySigner
errors.msg: The associated token account is not owned by signer

errors.name: TokenAccountNotForThisMint
errors.msg: The associated token account does not correspond to this token mint

errors.name: TransferCouldNotBeProcessed
errors.msg: The reqeusted transfer could not be processed

errors.name: WagerMustExceedTheGamesSpecifiedMinimum
errors.msg: The total wager must exceed the game's specified minimum

errors.name: InvalidUsername
errors.msg: Invalid username. Must be 8-20 characters long and contain only a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and _ values.

errors.name: CannotReduceSelfExcludeTime
errors.msg: It is not possible to change the self-exclusion time to be sooner than the existing value.

errors.name: PlayerHasSelfExcluded
errors.msg: The player has chosen to self-exclude from playing.

errors.name: PlayerHasRewardSlotsThatNeedToBeSettled
errors.msg: The player account has reward accrual slots that need to be settled first.

errors.name: TimestampProvidedNotWithinRelevantWindow
errors.msg: The time provided is not within the recording window

errors.name: HouseTokenAccountNotProvided
errors.msg: The HouseToken account was not provided in remaining_accounts

errors.name: HouseTokenAccountDoesNotMatchTheHouseTokenIdx
errors.msg: The HouseToken account provided does not match the house_token_idx

errors.name: ReferralRateCannotExceedPlatformRateMinusMaxRakebackRate
errors.msg: A referral rate cannot exceed the platform's rate minus the maximum rakeback rate

errors.name: InvalidPerMillionRate
errors.msg: Invalid perMillion rate

errors.name: RakebackRateCannotExceedPlatformRevenueShare
errors.msg: The maximum rakeback rate cannot exceed the platform's revenue share

errors.name: ReferralHasNotMetCriteriaToCollect
errors.msg: This referral scheme has not met the criteria to collect

errors.name: InvalidDaysToSpreadBonusAcross
errors.msg: The bonus must be spread over a minimum of one future day and a maximum of 27 future days

errors.name: TimeProvidedIsBeforeTheLastRefresh
errors.msg: The update timestamp provided is before the last_refresh. Should not be possible.

errors.name: RewardCalendarProvidedDoesNotCorrespondToAccounts
errors.msg: The reward calendar provided does not match the other accounts in context.

errors.name: CannotCloseRewardCalendarWithRemainingValue
errors.msg: Cannot close a player's reward calendar while uncollected value remains.

errors.name: CombinedRewardsRateExceedsPlatformRevenueShare
errors.msg: The combined referral and rewards rate cannot exceed the platform's own revenue share rate.

errors.name: PlatformRewardsTokenMustBeSpecifiedIfAnyRewardsAreOffered
errors.msg: The platform must specify a reward token if any rewards are to be offered.

errors.name: ReferralRateCannotExceedPlatformStatedMaximumReferralRate
errors.msg: A referral rate cannot exceed the platform's stated maximum referral rate.

errors.name: RewardSpreadConfigNotAcceptable
errors.msg: A reward spread config is not acceptable. It must be <100% up front and spread between 1 and 27 days.

errors.name: RewardsExceedPlatformRevenueShare
errors.msg: The combined player rewards and referral commission (in tokens) exceeds the platform's own revenue share amount.

errors.name: EdgeDistributionDoesNotTieUp
errors.msg: The distribution of the expected edge does not tie-up. (Player rakeback, bonus reserves, referral commission, gas reclaim, platform rev share and protocol rev share)

errors.name: TokenProvidedIsNotThePlatformRewardToken
errors.msg: The token provided is not the platform reward token.

errors.name: NothingToClaim
errors.msg: There is no reward or referral to claim at this time.

errors.name: CannotApplyBonusUntilCalendarIsUpToDate
errors.msg: Cannot apply new bonuses to the calendar unless the calendar has been refreshed.

errors.name: InvalidPlatformRankIdx
errors.msg: Invalid Platform Rank Idx must exist already or be the next in sequence

errors.name: PlatformRankThresholdMustExceedPreviousThreshold
errors.msg: A platform rank's XP threshold must exceed the previous threshold

errors.name: RankBenefitsExceedPlatformMaxCombinedRewardRate
errors.msg: A rank benefit config exceeds the platform's max combined benefit accrual rate

errors.name: PlayerHasNotReachedXpRequiredForLevelUp
errors.msg: The player has not reached the required XP to levelup ranks

errors.name: NothingToCollectOrForfeit
errors.msg: There are no collects or forfeits to update for on this reward calendar.

errors.name: CannotSyncBenefitsIfLevelUpIsRequired
errors.msg: Cannot sync levels where player's currenk rank is not consistent with their XP

errors.name: StaleOracleFeed
errors.msg: The oracle price feed is stale

errors.name: TransferExceedsAvailableAmount
errors.msg: The transfer amount requested exceeds the amount available

errors.name: MaxNumberOfHouseTokensReached
errors.msg: The max allowable number of tokens has been added to the house

errors.name: MaxNumberOfRanksReached
errors.msg: The max allowable number of ranks has been added to the house

errors.name: TermsVersionOutOfSequence
errors.msg: The new terms version provided is out of sequence
